import './update-post.css' import {useState} from 'react' const UpdatePostModal = ({setUpdatePost,post}) => { const [title,setTitle] = useState(post.title) const [description,setDescription] = useState(post.description) const [category,setCategory] = useState(post.category) return (
setUpdatePost(false)} >

Update Post

) } export default UpdatePostModal
